Zergling/Oinker


Zergling pulls out his bow wepon. He stays where he is. "Zergling, 
shall protect the bridge." Zergling looks on the scanners. "Awww,
They attack. Autoguns kill. Autoguns attack them. Autoguns kill. 
Hahaha." Zergling gets ready to defend the Bridge. "Internal Autoguns 
fire on any maximal in the ship." Zergling laughs. He was happy. "I 
hope some maximals come into the bridge so Zergling can kill."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Oinker walks into the tourter chambers his gun was drawn. (I'm
letting the maximal to get the first attack on Oinker. Maybe the 
Prisoners want to let of some anger, hehe)
